history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />. You are speaking to the ORANGE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER I'm going to the airport.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER I want traveled driving directions.
TTS <speak> No problem. <break strength='strong' /> I will give you driving directions to your destination. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Okay, going to pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where would you like to leave from?
USER I'm leaving from The Waterford.
TTS Okay, leaving from waterford nevillewood apartments. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER ASAP right now
TTS Okay, leaving from asap rescue inc.. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Okay, travelling at 02:49 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER Yes.

TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> I will pause after every step and give you time to write things down. <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 2 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 40 minutes.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Head northwest toward Penn avenue. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Take your time to write down the step <break strength='weak' /> and let me know when you are finished. </speak>
USER alarms
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER Okay, what did you say?
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn left toward Penn avenue. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER Where do I turn where do I start?
TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />. You are speaking to the ORANGE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER driving
TTS <speak> No problem. <break strength='strong' /> I will give you driving directions to your destination. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you want to go?
USER Airport
TTS What is your destination?
USER Airport
TTS I am having difficulty understanding. Please try giving a nearby street corner or monument. Where are you going?
USER I'm going to the airport.
TTS Okay, going to pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Okay, leaving from pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you wanna travel?
USER now ASAP
TTS Okay, travelling at 02:52 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER Yes.

TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> I will pause after every step and give you time to write things down. <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 min.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Head on Airport Blvd. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Take your time to write down the step <break strength='weak' /> and let me know when you are finished. </speak>
USER Okay fair.
TTS <speak> Were the provided directions useful? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Would you use GetGoing again? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
USER Penn
